Package ch.colabproject.colab.api.model.user

Class AuthMethod

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.colabproject.colab.api.model.user.AuthMethod
  • public class AuthMethod
extends java.lang.Object
    This method request the client to send a password using the mandatoryMethod. If an optionalMethod is provided, the client should also send its password using this very method. It will cause the rotation of the methods. *
    Author:
    maxence

        Build payload to send to client
        Parameters:
        mandatoryMethod - non null hash method

        optionalMethod - optional hash method
        newSalt - salt to use with optional hash method
